trends: There have been no other sightings in Alba
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright unblinking lights in triangle shape
divs: Sighting DetailsFor about 5 minutes, I watched a trio of bright unblinking lights in triangle pattern move from the southwest to the northeast until they disappeared beyond the horizon. I could not accurately judge size of craft or distance from my location. I couldn't hear any noises or see any flames. I hope it lands next time so I can hop onboard!
